title: Ordering Drinks at a Bar
introduction: This lesson follows a dialogue between a customer and a bartender, focusing on ordering different types of drinks and asking about bar specials.

story.speaker: speaker1
story.translation: Good evening, what beers do you have?

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Tenemos cervezas locales e importadas. ¿Prefieres alguna?
story.translation: We have local and imported beers. Do you have a preference?

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Me gustaría una cerveza local, por favor.
story.translation: I'd like a local beer, please.

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: La cerveza 'Estrella Montaña' es muy popular aquí.
story.translation: 'Estrella Montaña' beer is very popular here.

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Perfecto, tomaré una de esas. ¿Tienen también vinos?
story.translation: Perfect, I'll have one of those. Do you also have wines?

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Sí, tenemos una selección de vinos blancos y tintos. ¿Te interesa alguno?
story.translation: Yes, we have a selection of white and red wines. Are you interested in any?

story.speaker: speaker1
story.message: Una copa de vino tinto, por favor. ¿Qué snacks recomiendas?
story.translation: A glass of red wine, please. What snacks do you recommend?

story.speaker: speaker2
story.message: Las aceitunas y el queso manchego van muy bien con el vino tinto.
story.translation: Olives and Manchego cheese go very well with red wine.
